language.option: The config file version is {1}. But it's need {2}.
Your database version is {1}. It's need {2}.
Can't find JID of occupant. This may occur because of incorrect settings of the room. The work of bot in this mode is not guaranteed.

Basics of guidance: All commands begins with ! After the command must be specified parameters: parameter - required parameter parameter1|parameter2 - parameter1 OR parameter2 (one of) [parameter] - optional parameter
Set value of option. Example: !set answer_mode=1
Get value of option. Can be enter without parameter, then show the value of all options. With a parameter it will show only for specified. Example: !gc answer_mode.
Show last n conference messages. Example: !log 10
Show list of users. Shows users that are online or have ever been online. To get status of defined user enter JID or nick as a parameter. Example: !users deg

Send message to user. First parameter is address (user OR room (conference)). Second parameter is type: chat OR groupchat (for room (conference)). The third is text of message. Example: !msg "room@conference.jabber.ru" "groupchat" "Example message".
Show response time from the user (ping of user). Example: !ping deg
Enter into the room. Example: !join room@conference.jabber.ru
Set a greeting of the user. Example: !greet "nagg@jabber.ru" "room@conference.jabber.ru" "Welcome, nagg!"
Set s farewell message (The message, which shows, when user leave a conference). Example: !farewell "nagg@jabber.ru" "room@conference.jabber.ru" "nagg is gone"
Show time of inactivity (time elapsed since the last active user actions) in a room (conference). Example: !idle deg
Quit the server (bot leaves the server on and off).
Set topic in the room. Example: !topic Welcome!

Ban the user. First parameter is nick or jid of user. The second is time (You can use abbreviation like 5m - 5 minutes, 5h - 5 hours, 3M - 3 months). If time is specified, ban will be automatically removed after specified period of time. Third parameter is reason (optional). Example: !ban "vovan" "5h" "There is a reason"

Kick user from the room. If time is specified the user (if user trying to enter) will be automatically kicked during the specified time. First parameter is jid Or nick. The second is time (see above !ban). The third is reason (optional). Example: !kick vovan 5m just_so
Cancel operation of the '!kick' command. This command need only if '!kick' command was entered with a parameter 'time'. Example: !unkick vovan
Enable the specified plug-in. Example: !enable lastfm
Disable the specified plug-in. Example: !disable lastfm
Reload all plug-ins. Can be useful if some plug-in has changed.
Set definition for embedded base. Example: !dfn wow=game
Show the definition from embedded base. Example: !wtf wow
Show count of definitions in the embedded base.
Show random definition from embedded base.
Show current revision of definition. Example: !wtfrev wow
Show texet of all revisions of the definition. Example: "!wtffull wow"
Undo the defition to defined revision. Example: "!wtfset wow 1"
Show count of words-lexems in base.
{1}. {2} (The last time was at {3} in room {4})
